overview:
Scott Chappell is publisher of the online magazine Stated [ http://www.statedmag.com ] and a consultant working primarily for design-oriented organizations seeking marketing strategy, planning and execution.

He is an expert in online publishing, social media, experiential learning, instructional design and product strategy. He has a strong history in performing product development and marketing for non- and for-profit education organizations and has presented in front of large audiences internationally.
